text: Ron Dean (12 January 1916 – 23 April 1998) was an Australian rules footballer who played with Collingwood in the Victorian Football League (VFL). == Notes == == External links == * *Profile on Collingwood Forever Category:1916 births Category:1998 deaths Category:Australian rules footballers from Victoria (Australia) Category:Collingwood Football Club players Category:Brighton Football Club players
title: Ron Dean (footballer, born 1916)
